sentences.sentence: He was also a writer of beautiful stories, some of which are collaborations with his fiancée.
sentences.translation: 他也撰写优美的故事，有些是和他的未婚妻合作的成果。

sentences.sentence: There are historical and political reasons as to why collaborations emerge.
sentences.translation: 这项合作的产生有其历史和政治上的原因。

sentences.sentence: He says collaborations have also emerged because of increased possibilities.
sentences.translation: 他说，合作的出现也是因为可能性的增加。
